title: muruganai dinamumE
sahitya:
muruganai dinamumE karudinAl manamE peralAm urudiyAi iru lOka sukhamE


anupallavi

  aruLadaip-purivadil piriyam uDaiyavan aLLi adai aLittu uLLam kaLippavan


caraNam    aDaikkalam enrAl abhayam enriDuvAn abhayam enrAlO aLittE viDuvAn
kaDaikkaNNaruLai kOrinAl panniru kaNgaLum kaniya karuNai koNDiDuvAn
